name: getLiveStreamDetails
description:
Zoom allows users to [live stream a meeting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001777826-Live-Streaming-Meetings-or-Webinars-Using-a-Custom-Service) to a custom platform. Use this API to get a meeting's live stream configuration details such as Stream URL, Stream Key and Page URL.

**Prerequisites:**
* Meeting host must be a licensed user with a Pro or higher plan.
* Live streaming details must have been [configured](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001777826-Live-Streaming-Meetings-or-Webinars-Using-a-Custom-Service#h_01589a6f-a40a-4e18-a448-cb746e52ebc5) for the meeting.

**Scopes:** `meeting:read:admin` `meeting:read`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

$ul: **page_url**: Live streaming page URL. This is the URL using which anyone can view the live stream of the meeting.
